General.Name: Acheter Louer
General.Description: Acheter-Louer.Fr SA provides communications solutions for commercial development and enhancement of the professions of its clients, independent real estate agents, federated in groups or franchisees, developers, banks, mortgage brokers, and institutional customers. The company offers newspapers to individuals in displays; marketing solutions; and production of sales aid tools and advisory services on communication strategy. It also operates Buy-Louer.fr, a real estate advertising site in France, as well as develops personalized websites and various web-mobile applications. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Acheter-Louer.Fr SA is a subsidiary of Adomos S.A.
